description: Filter categories for female-solo content curation

male_presence.description: Male anatomy, male characters, or heterosexual acts
male_presence.note: Blocks any male involvement in the image

anal_content.note: All anal content is filtered regardless of context

non_human_partner.description: Monster, creature, or non-human sexual partners
non_human_partner.note: Fantasy RACES like elf are OK; fantasy CREATURES are not

violence_gore.description: Blood, wounds, death, or violent content

bodily_waste.description: Excrement, urine, vomit, or related fetishes

extreme_fetish.description: Extreme body modification, inflation, or forced scenarios
extreme_fetish.note: Regular lactation is OK; forced/mechanical is not
